# ChangeLog
## 4.8.11
* XSS bypass in security-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5919

## 4.8.10
* Add ebayadvertising.com and ebayadvertising.de to valid domain list

## 4.8.9
* [security-ebay] Unvalidated Redirection Bypass at 'ru' Parameter, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5477

## 4.8.6
* Fix: Added check If URL pattern includes username or password, it is not a valid URL, e.g http://username:password@host:port/path, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5424

## 4.8.5
* Add tld check https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/ACTIVITY-24209

## 4.8.3
Revert: Added %22(") to query param check
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4874

## 4.8.2
* NODE-4950: Open Redirect (URL redirector bypass), https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4950

## 4.8.1
* Added %22(") to query param check
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4874

## 4.7.2
* Add ebay.us to valid domain list

## 4.7.1
* Allow other text/plain content-type to be exempt from xss middleware call (#75)

## 4.7.0
* Added isValidNativeEbayDomain, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4083

## 4.6.1
* Fix: isValidRedirect security issue, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4203

## 4.6.0
* Added isSensitiveParameter, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4062

## 4.5.0
* Typescript support for security-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3727

## 4.4.0
* Added support for ebay deep link for native apps, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3726

# 4.3.10
* NODE-2984: Removed unused xss params as per GIS team.
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2984

# 4.3.9
* moved async read of config into main function

# 4.3.8
* NODE-2653, using async to load module-config-inc

# 4.3.6
* Fixed: Enabled HSTS by default

# 4.3.5
* Fixed: CookieManager should set cookie domain to valid eBay domains only, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2380

# 4.3.4
* Added HSTS header to security-ebay module (Contributed by Geet Chadda)

## 4.3.1
* Added `maskObject` API for masking any Object & stringify

## 4.2.1
* Provide an option to disable xss checks on req.body
  
## v4.1.0
* App based whitelisting and tests using raptor and local config

## v4.0.4
* Added sanitization of sensitive parameters in referer

## v4.0.3
* Added req.security context to hold any security parameter that should not be exposed via req.query and get into a lot of other context before we can sanitize them

## v4.0.2
* Moved token security validation from service-security-ebay to this module to share between web and service flows, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1513
* Fixed: security-ebay: should report violations on res.complete, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1537

## v4.0.1
* Safeguard existing domain list for redirect validation and allow adding to it via raptor config

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies
* Fixed the issue with `url`, added `originalUrl`

## v0.1.13
* Added config based query parameter masking while logging to CAL
http://raptor/raptor/2.5.x/docs/Raptor-Security/masking-sensitive-params.md

## v0.1.12
* Bug fix for open redirect without protocol. ('//www.google.com' returns true)
* Added `isValidRedirect` function to deprecate `isValidDomain`

## v0.1.11
* Added API `getMaskPayload` for masking query params

## v0.1.10
* Allow disabling qualyscan filter to prepare for nodejs qualyscan to be enabled across all apps.

## v0.1.9
* Added XSS filtering for request path, query string, form inputs and JSON body.

## v0.1.8
* Bug fix to null check for host name while url redirection validation

## v0.1.6
* Added middleware to add `X-Content-Type-Options` header to response.

## v0.1.5
* Moved qualys-scan filter to `@ebay/security-ebay` module

## v0.1.4
* Added middleware to remove `x-powered-by` header from response.

## v0.1.3
* Removing duplicate domains

## v0.1.2
* Adding the missing valid domains

## v0.1.1
* Providing config bean to turn off URL redirection check

## v0.1.0
* Initial release with API to validate invalid domains
